Alerts.NoFieldsSelected: No fields are selected for export. Please check the Settings.
Alerts.SelectOne: Select at least one PO line to process.

EntityList.TitleSelect: Select PO lines to enable export options.

NoEntities.Description: To begin, go to the PO Line List in Alma. This app will automatically display the visible items, which you can select and export.
NoEntities.Title: Welcome to the PO Line Export CloudApp

Alerts.ResetInfo: Settings have been reset. Click Save to apply.

CustomHeader.Label: Custom File Header
CustomHeader.Placeholder: Enter the text that will appear at the top of the exported file.

Settings.Instruction: Select the fields you want to export. Click on a field name to change the column name, and drag to reorder. In the text field below, you can customize the file header.
Settings.Title: Settings
